# Read data

```{r, echo = FALSE}
df <-
  "C:/Users/chanb/Box Sync/Facebook pilot - Statisticians/Lifetime ad performance by day, no consents or completions 5.19.17.xlsx" %>% 
  read_excel() %>% 
  filter(row_number() > 1)
names(df) <- c("date",
               "ad",
               "clicksTotal",
               "clicksUnique",
               "linkClicksTotal",
               "linkClicksUnique",
               "reactions",
               "comments",
               "shares")
df <-
  df %>% 
  mutate(date = as.Date(as.integer(date), origin = as.Date("1900-01-01"))) %>% 
  mutate(adImage = factor(gsub("\\s-.*", "", ad)),
         adText = factor(gsub(".*-\\s", "", ad))) %>% 
  select(-c(ad))
```

```{r}
df %>% group_by(adImage, adText) %>% summarize(n = length(date)) %>% kable
```
